## 歷史指令
+ history
```
318  nginx -s reload
319  nginx -t
320  nano  /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
321  nano  /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
322  nginx -t
323  nano  /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
324  nginx -t
325  cd /etc/nginx
326  ls
327  cd default.d/
328  ls
329  mv php.conf ../conf.d/
330  nginx -t
331  cd ../
332  ls
333  cd conf.d
334  ls
335  rm php*
336  nginx -t
337  nginx -s reload
338  history
```
